src_text: Ngaka Ehud Ur, moprofesara wa bongaka mane Dalhousie University e leng Halifax, Nova Scotia le modulasetulo wa lekala la tsa meriana le disaense la Mokgatlo wa Lefu la Tswekere la Canada (Canadian Diabetes Association) o hlokomedisitse hore patlisiso ena e sa le sethathong.
ref_text: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
hyp_text: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the medical advisory board of the Canadian Diabetes Association, has emphasized that this research is not conclusive.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Ka Mantaha, Sara Danius, e leng mongodi wa nako yohle wa Komiti ya Dingolwa ya Nobel mane Swedish Academy, o phatlaladitse pontsheng nakong ya lenaneo la radiyo la Sveriges Radio mane Sweden hore komiti, ha e sa kgone ho fihlella Bob Dylan ka kotloloho mabapi le ho hapa Kgau ya Nobel ya 2016 ho tsa Dingolwa, e nyahladitse boiteko ba yona ba ho mo fihlella.
ref_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
hyp_text: On Manda, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee, announced on the Swedish Radio's morning show in Sweden that the committee had failed to reach Bob Dylan regarding the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, and apologized for their failed attempts to contact him.

src_text: Jwalo ka NSA, o thusitse Carter ho sebetsana le ditaba tsa bodiplomate tsa lefatshe, jwalo ka Camp David Accords, 1978; ho tlisa maemong a matle dikamano dipakeng tsa US–China dilemong tsa bo-1970; Phetolo ya Puso ya Iran, e lebisitseng tlokotsing ya ho kwetelwa le ho tshwarwa ha batho, 1979; le tlhaselong ya Soviet mane Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
hyp_text: Like the NSA, Carter facilitated diplomatic efforts around the world, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978; establishing diplomatic relations between the US and China in the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the taking of hostages and the crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Metsotso e mehlano kamora ho qaleha ha pontsho moya wa qala ho tsukutla, nako ya motsotso ha morao, moya wa fihlela lebelo la 70km/h... yaba pula ya qala, empa ka matla hona hoo e neng e otla letlalo la hao jwalo ka ho hlajwa ke nalete, kamora mona sefako sa theoha, batho ba ne ba tshohile mme ba tlatsitse lerata ebile ba matha ba hatana hodimo.
ref_text: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
hyp_text: Five minutes after the storm started, the wind speed increased, reaching 70km/h... it started raining, but with such force that it was as if the roof was being blown off, and after the heavy downpour, people came out and started to clear the debris, and even though they were soaked, they were laughing on top.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

hyp_text: This year has been a success, because it has achieved the main goal of serving the nation and the people, and this achievement has surpassed the law that was previously accepted and written in many international agreements in the past two centuries.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

ref_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.

src_text: Tabeng ya Romanticism, dibaka di ile tsa susumetsa dikelello tsa batho, mme ha nako e ntse e feta ho ile ha hlahella meetlo le setso tse amanang le sebaka seo, mme tumellanong le sebaka seo setjhaba seo se leng ho sona, di ne di le molemo ho feta melao eo di qobellwang ho e amohela.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Ho batho ba Australia, kgopolo ya kofi ya “flat white” ke e sa tsejweng. Kofi etsho e bitswa ‘espresso’, cappuccino etla e tshwetswe lebejana le lengata (eseng lekweba), mme tee e fumaneha ntle le lebese.
ref_text: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.

src_text: Serapa sa naha sa Plitvice Lakes se na le meru e mengata, haholo-holo ka difate tsa beech, spruce le fir, mme e na le motsoako wa dimela tsa Alpine le Mediterranean.
ref_text: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
hyp_text: The national park of Plitvice Lakes has a diverse flora, especially in the beech, spruce and fir forests, and it also has a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
